CreateConsole.description: Creates a console window that logs extender internals. Mainly useful for debugging. (Default: `false`

EnableLogging.description: Enable logging of Osiris activity (rule evaluation, queries, etc.) to a log file. (Default: `false`)

LogRuntime.description: Log extender console and script output to a log file. (Default: `false`)

LogCompile.description: Log Osiris story compilation to a log file. (Default: `false`)

LogFailedCompile.description: Log errors during Osiris story compilation to a log file. (Default: `true`)

LogDirectory.description: Directory where the generated Osiris logs will be stored. (Default: `My Documents\OsirisLogs`)

EnableExtensions.description: Make the Osiris extension functionality available in game or in the editor. (Default: `true`)

SendCrashReports.description: Upload minidumps to the crash report collection server after a game crash. (Default: `true`)

DumpNetworkStrings.description: Not Implemented! ~~Dumps the NetworkFixedString table to LogDirectory. Mainly useful for debugging desync issues.~~

DeveloperMode.description: Enables various debug functionality for development purposes. (Default: `false`)

DisableModValidation.description: Disable module hashing when loading modules. (Default: `true`)

DebuggerPort.description: Port number the Osiris debugger will listen on (Default: `9999`)

LuaDebuggerPort.description: Port number the Lua debugger will listen on (Default: 9998)
